title: Two key panels urge Karnataka government to align recruitments with changing economy
content:
Two key panels have recommended reforms to the Karnataka government's recruitment processes.
*   The primary advice is to align these hiring practices with the current economic landscape.
*   This alignment aims to ensure the state's workforce meets the demands of a changing economy.

title: PM orders accountability over NCERT judiciary ‘corruption’ content; Education Minister vows action
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The Prime Minister has ordered accountability regarding controversial content found in NCERT materials.
*   The content in question reportedly depicts "corruption" within the judiciary.
*   The Education Minister has vowed to take action in response to the issue.

title: CAG’s Bihar report for 2023 flags revenue arrears to government
content:
Here are 3 bullet points summarizing the headline:

*   The Comptroller and Auditor General (CAG) has released its 2023 report for Bihar.
*   This report highlights concerns regarding outstanding revenue.
*   These are funds legally owed to, but not yet collected by, the Bihar state government.

title: Mithali Raj inaugurates Riviera 2026 at VIT in Vellore
content:
**Mithali Raj** officially inaugurated an event.
*   The event is named **'Riviera 2026'**.
*   The inauguration took place at **VIT in Vellore**.

title: NLCIL signs MoU with NPTI for skill development programme
content:
NLCIL and NPTI have signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU).
*   The agreement's primary purpose is skill development.
*   They will collaborate on implementing a new skill development programme.

title: Congress alleges irregularities in land acquisition for Adani coal block in M.P.’s Singrauli, seeks joint panel
content:
Congress has alleged irregularities in the land acquisition process.
*   The allegations concern land acquired for an Adani coal block in Singrauli, Madhya Pradesh.
*   The party is demanding a joint panel investigation into these alleged irregularities.

title: Railway Minister announces portal to attract innovative tech solutions
content:
The Railway Minister has announced the launch of an online portal.
*   Its primary purpose is to attract innovative technology solutions.
*   The initiative aims to leverage external expertise for advancements within the railway sector.

title: CM Stalin virtually inaugurates District Central Library in Ranipet
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   CM Stalin virtually inaugurated a facility.
*   The inaugurated facility is the District Central Library.
*   The library is located in Ranipet.

title: Budget aims to transform Thrikkakara municipality into ‘waste-free’ local body
content:
A new budget has been introduced for Thrikkakara municipality.
*   The primary aim of this budget is to facilitate a significant transformation within the municipality.
*   The ultimate goal is for Thrikkakara to become a 'waste-free' local body.

title: T.N. government simplifies processing of planning permission applications in notified HACA areas
content:
The Tamil Nadu government has streamlined the application process for planning permissions.
*   The initiative aims to simplify and quicken the processing of these applications.
*   These changes specifically apply to areas designated as 'notified HACA areas'.
